alert.note: Alert for Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Manitowoc County through 730 PM CDT... At 641 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Nazianz, or 10 miles north of Howards Grove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Valders, St. Nazianz, Camp Rokilio Scout Camp, Newton, Spring Valley, Louis Corners, St Nazianz, Collins and Steinthal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
